articles.description: Scoey Mitchell, the trailblazing stand-up comedian who starred on the short-lived sitcom version of Neil Simon‘s Barefoot in the Park, has died. He was 92. Mitchell died Saturday of kidney failure at a long-term health care facility in Torrance, California, h…
articles.content:
